title: \* BT English 111 - Cursive and serif in logo, can't find it!
content:
Anyone know what's used in this logo?

I know Shopfitters.... is Avante Garde, and the rest is... well, Helvetica.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tjp-002.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820124642/http:/typophile.com/files/tjp-002.jpg) | 53.32 KB |
author: buddhaboy

comments.content: Originality is only protected by the obscurity of your inspirations... oops sorry for the double post...

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820124642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Purdy_6499.JPG)
  
ITC Garamond Light, manually obliqued. Anybody else got the big script **P**?
Wow, thanks folks... that's great... BT English 111 is spot on! Shame on me for not seeing Garamond pushed over ...
